title: YUNOREVIEW: November 2021 (Zack Fox, Imagine Dragons, Damon Albarn, Andrew W.K.)
description:
The magical monthly segment where I briefly touch down on a gauntlet of albums I didn't get a chance to review this past month...or longer. These are just my short, straightforward, passionate, biased opinions.

ZACK FOX - SHUT THE FUCK UP TALKING TO ME
CORBIN - GHOST WITH SKIN
EVERY TIME I DIE - RADICAL
IMAGINE DRAGONS - MERCURY ACT 1
CITY MORGUE - VOL. 3: BOTTOM OF THE BARREL
MAXO KREAM - WEIGHT OF THE WORLD
TWIABP - ILLUSORY WALLS
KYARY PAMYU PAMYU - CANDY RACER
GROUPER - SHADE
BIG SEAN & HIT-BOY - WHAT YOU EXPECT
XENIA RUBINOS - UNA ROSA
BBNO$ - EAT YA VEGGIES
MICK JENKINS - ELEPHANT IN THE ROOM
ANDREW W.K. - GOD IS PARTYING
DAMON ALBARN - THE NEARER THE FOUNTAIN...

description:

title: YUNOREVIEW: October 2021 (Spiritbox, Amyl, Meek Mill, Metallica)
description:
The magical monthly segment where I briefly touch down on a gauntlet of albums I didn't get a chance to review this past month...or several. These are just my short, straightforward, passionate, biased opinions.

Pond - 9
Full of Hell - Garden of Burning Apparitions
Adia Victoria - A Southern Gothic
the Moutain Goats - Dark in Here
